5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever prays twenty Rak’ah between Maghrib and ‘Isha’, Allah will build for him a house in Paradise.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ بَيْنَ الْمَغْرِبِ وَالْعِشَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning praying between the Maghrib and ‘Isha’
